thread.title: The Conversation Hour: Amanda Palmer & Candy Bowers
thread.title_full: The Conversation Hour: Amanda Palmer & Candy Bowers

title: The Conversation Hour: Amanda Palmer & Candy Bowers
text:
Amanda Palmer & Candy Bowers Share Download (20.77 MB) MP3 available 20.77   Emily Sexton. She's Head of Programming at The Wheeler Centre for Books, Writing, and Ideas. The Wheeler Centre Gala 2017: Stories for the Dead is on at Hamer Hall, Arts Centre Melbourne this Sunday (26th Feb, 2017) at 5:30pm. 
Their first guest is musician, author, composer, and director Amanda Palmer. She's forging a new model for paying artists at Kickstarter and now Patreon. Her gigs at the Gasometer Hotel (tonight and March 2nd & 9th) are all sold out, but you can still get tickets to see her at the National Gallery of Victoria (NGV) on Friday 10th March, 2017. Or you can catch her in Stories for the Dead (details above). 
  writer, actor, activist, comedian, and producer Candy Bowers. She is the co-artistic director of the Black Honey Company and is currently appearing in Newton's Law , ABC TV, Thursdays 8:30pm. Or you can catch her in Stories for the Dead (details above).
